We buy gently used items, if you are having a estate sale, garage sale, or just have items in your attic let us know and we can come where you live..
Just call us and we can come and look at all the items that you need to just sell. We need Old Stamps, Cast Iron Pans, Dressers, Bedroom sets, Tools Lawnmowers, Vacuums, Bikes, Knives, and gently used furniture, beds, headboards, misc items.
J & L's Second Chance
